name: Planet Dysphoria
description:
(An Escape Attempt)

Art/Design/Writing/Programming by andrewhowizon, 

Programming by  Fishagon,

 {trigger warning for this text and also the game}

 

TL;DR

Where?  Planet Dysphoria -- the manifestation of gender dysphoria.

Who?  A person in their twenties experiencing dysphoria.

How?  First-person-POV, mystery game with point and click interactions.

Read the Wikipedia Page for Gender Dysphoria

Control Notes:

Left Click : Interact with objects +/- : Increase / Decrease Music Volume ] / [ : Increase / Decrease Mouse Sensitivity
